actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution amending the standing rules of the Senate with respect to unanimous-consent requests.

summary.text: Amends the Standing Rules of the Senate by adding a rule which requires that a request for unanimous consent made by a Senator must be made by that Senator orally.

titles.title: A resolution amending the standing rules of the Senate with respect to unanimous-consent requests.
